name: Janet Fair & Natural Face Wash
description:
Fair & Natural face wash Improves your skin by making the skin softer, smoother & healthier and Lightens skin by reducing dark spots & pigmentation. Ingredients are
Aloe Vera, Olive, Honey, Rose, Carrot, Marigold, Turmeric, Wheatgerm, Lime, Arnica.*Images for illustration purpose only. Product received may vary.
